text: Had a late day Buffet onely $5.95 nothing special about food thats been out since AM like the topsilog, eggplant, & fried egg. The mongo was fresh nothing special in Flavor or chop suey
Best pinoy restaurant for me compared to Lorraine and Joy. Food is good. Hot. Very afforable and they have the friendliest staff ever. Food is VERY delicious

It says open at 7am. We got there at 8am and its closed on a thursday morning. I looked in the window to see if there is any workers in there. None. If they are close for the day, they should post a sign.
